key_features: Mix-and-match capsule pieces for multiple outfits
Suitable for casual, university, and outings
description: A modern capsule collection that helps you style multiple trendy looks with a few essential pieces.

faqs.is_it_office_friendly: Yes, items like blazers and trousers work well for smart-casual settings.
faqs.how_to_choose_size: Choose true-to-size for fitted looks; size up for oversized street style.
faqs.can_items_be_worn_separately: Yes, all pieces are designed to be mixed and matched.
faqs.is_it_suitable_for_daily_wear: Yes, the fabrics are comfortable for long wear.
faqs.is_it_trendy_or_classic: It combines current trends with wearable everyday styles.
